var prefixArray = [String]()

import Foundation

func solution(_ my_string:String, _ is_prefix:String) -> Int {
    var prefixArray = [String]()

    my_string.map{$0}.indices.map {

        prefixArray.append(String(my_string.map{$0}.prefix($0 + 1)))

    }
    
    return prefixArray.contains(is_prefix) ? 1 : 0
}
